Title: I feel sorry for men with one wife – Ned Nwoko
Summary: Senator Ned Nwoko said polygamy gives men stability and balance in their homes . The lawmaker representing Delta North made the statement while appearing on Channels Television’s Politics .

Title: Police dismiss fear of planned unrest, assure safety on Third Mainland Bridge
Summary: Police dismiss fear of planned unrest, assure safety on Third Mainland Bridge . Lagos State Police Command has calmed the frayed nerves of Lagosians . Some youths in the Oworonshoki area were reportedly planning to disrupt the bridge .

Title: How Nigeria’s debt profile decreased under Tinubu’s administration
Summary: The National Orientation Agency (NOA) has said that Nigeria’s debt profile “significantly decreased” since President Bola Tinubu took office in 2023, challenging widespread misconceptions and citing an explainer from 24 October cites data from the Debt Management Office (DMO)

Title: Why Eauxwell remains Nigeria’s leading solar EPC
Summary: As Nigeria pushes to diversify its energy mix, private solar developers have become pivotal to the country’s clean energy drive . Eauxwell Nigeria Limited has emerged as one of the most visible and successful solar EPCs in Nigeria .

Title: Xiaomi Black Friday 2025: Massive discounts, exclusive gifts, and a chance to win a trip to Europe!
Summary: Xiaomi Nigeria is bringing unbeatable deals, exciting gifts, and an incredible opportunity for fans across the country to win a trip to Europe! From October 27th to November 30th, Xiaomi Nigeria will bring unbeatable discounts and exclusive gifts . The biggest shopping season of the year is here!

Title: ADC accuses APC of plot to destabilize Kaduna opposition
Summary: Kaduna State chapter of the African Democratic Congress (ADC) accuses ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) of orchestrating plans to infiltrate and weaken the opposition in the state .

Title: Ekiti 2026: APC affirms Oyebanji as consensus candidate
Summary: The motion was moved in Ado-Ekiti on Monday by the Senate Leader, Senator Opeyemi Bamidele and seconded by the Speaker of Ekiti State House of Assembly, Stephen Aribasoye .

Title: Why I won’t defend FG’s charge against me – Nnamdi Kanu
Summary: IPOB leader Nnamdi Kanu says there is no valid charge to warrant his defence . Kanu said he had gone through the case file and discovered that he discovered that there was not a valid charge .

Title: JAMB clears 85 underage candidates for exceptional admission
Summary: JAMB clears 85 underage candidates for exceptional admission . The exceptional admission policy aligns with global best practices, where underage cases are treated as rare exceptions rather than the norm .

Title: Boxer allegedly kills carpenter over burst football in Ikorodu
Summary: Rumour had it that the suspect was still in the custody of the Imota Police Station, whereas he was supposed to have been transferred .

Title: FATF delisting will boost investor confidence in Nigeria —  SEC DG
Summary: SEC Director General Emomotimi Agama said the development would significantly enhance investor confidence and attract more foreign investments . President Bola Tinubu described it as “a major milestone in Nigeria’s journey towards economic reform, institutional integrity, and global credibility”

Title: BREAKING: PDP postpones screening of aspirants for national convention
Summary: The PDP has announced the postponement of the screening of aspirants for its 2025 Elective National Convention, earlier scheduled for Tuesday, October 28, 2025 . The exercise was put on hold due to “unforeseen circumstances” The postponement comes a few hours after a key member of the party and former governor of Jig

Title: EPL: Ex-Man Utd star backs Arsenal for Premier League glory
Summary: Gary Neville has declared Arsenal the frontrunners to clinch the Premier League title this season . Neville believes that Mikel Arteta’s squad can secure the championship without needing to amass 90 or 100 points, stressing that their current consistency will be key to success . Following their 1-0 victory against Crystal Palace on Sunday, Arsenal sit

Title: Sheikh Gumi urges divorce rights for abused women in Islam
Summary: Sheikh Ahmad Gumi made the call during his weekly Tafsir session held at the Sultan Bello Mosque in Kaduna . He said Islam does not condone oppression in marriage and that both men and women are granted the right to end a union when mutual respect and compassion are lost .

Title: Israeli hostage families demand pause in Gaza ceasefire plan
Summary: Families of Israeli hostages on Monday demanded that the next steps in the US-brokered Gaza ceasefire be put on hold until Hamas returns the remaining bodies of dead captives . Hamas says it is committed to the ceasefire and insists it is trying to return 13 more bodies . Israel’s subsequent assault on Gaza killed at least 68,527
